mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audio.using_log (ip_addr, time, content, member_id) VALUES(#{ip_addr}, #{time}, #{content}, #{member_id});
mapper.select: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS row_num, no, ip_addr, time, content, member_id FROM (SELECT * FROM audio.using_log WHERE ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' ORDER BY time DESC) temp LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS row_num, no, ip_addr, time, content, member_id FROM (SELECT * FROM audio.using_log WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND (ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%') ORDER BY time DESC) temp LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
WHERE ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND (ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%')
